title: Pyrolysis mechanism and pyrolysis kinetics of yellow wine lees
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16951-16959
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01541J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kong Ling-Niao, Ge Song-Tao, Yuan Yang, Feng Feng
Yellow wine lees are advantageous raw materials of biochar. The pyrolysis of yellow wine lees is divided into three stages. The pyrolysis of yellow wine lees conforms to the assumptions of infinite parallel reactions and activation energy distribution.
